title: The Enforcer

fields.name: Beatdown (Passive):
fields.value: When you carry the Mafia factional kill, you will deal two attacks to the target. If the first attack kills your target, your second attack will instead attack a random player who visits you. Your attacks cannot be redirected by any means.

fields.name: Intimidating Presence (Passive):
fields.value: If you are in a Hello Neighbor with a player and place above them in the Evening phase, their Attack Power will drop to 0.5x if they attack a Mafia-aligned player the following Night or the Night after.

fields.name: Efficiency (Locked, x2):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked if you place in the Top 3. Target a Mafia player using an action that has a Charge. The ammo for the ability is not consumed, but the ability is still used.
